### tryFromBech32(addr): [Address](#address)

Tries to create an `Address` from a Bech32 encoded string.

| Parameter | Type   | Description |
| --------- | ------ | ----------- |
| addr      | String |             |

### toBech32(hrp): String

| Parameter | Type   | Description |
| --------- | ------ | ----------- |
| hrp       | String |             |

### verify(msg, signature): void

| Parameter | Type                                | Description |
| --------- | ----------------------------------- | ----------- |
| msg       | byte[]                              |             |
| signature | [SignatureUnlock](#signatureunlock) |             |
